summary: this plugin is to help you add a c++ class conveniently
name: AddCppClass
description:
this plugin is to help you add a c++ class conveniently. 
after you install this plugin, type :AddCppClass under normal mode, you will be leaded to a wizard that help you add a c++ class.


contact me if you have any question or suggestion. (email: xuhdev AT gmail DOT com)
install_details: extract the zip file to your runtime folder(~/.vim on Linux and $VIM_INSTALLATION_FOLDER\vimfiles on windows)

versions.release_notes: fix a bug in the document.
